definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
Hu Jintao (1942-), General Secretary of the CCP 2002-2012, president of the PRC 2003-2013
Shi Tao (1642-1707), Chinese landscape painter and poet
variant of 波濤粼粼|波涛粼粼[bo1 tao1 lin2 lin2]

sentences.english: Sometime God speaks through whispering pine.
sentences.chinese: 有時神透過鬆濤低語說話。

sentences.english: Chen Tao graduated from the Central Conservatory of Music in 1986, from the Folk Music Department.
sentences.chinese: 陳濤1986年畢業於中央音樂學院民間音樂部。

sentences.english: I felt so guilty as if I was committing a heinous crime being depressed.
sentences.chinese: 我感到非常羞愧，好像患上抑鬱症是犯了濤天罪行。

sentences.english: Her father also expresses his dislike for Luo Tao, Zhao Shan's boyfriend.
sentences.chinese: 趙爸爸這時也對明表達了對趙姍男友羅濤的不喜。

sentences.english: Topsail is a famous little boat . It has sailed across the Atlantic many times .
sentences.chinese: “濤波賽”是艘有名的小艇，它已經多次橫渡大西洋。

sentences.english: He will be in his small boat, Topsail.Tapsail is a famous little boat.
sentences.chinese: 他將乘坐他的‘濤波賽’號小艇。

sentences.english: Instead, the Chinese president Hu Jintao's speech stuck to party orthodoxy.
sentences.chinese: 相反，中國主席濤胡錦的講話則堅持黨的正統。

sentences.english: The editorial department disbands , Huang Tao has been shut in the cowshed.
sentences.chinese: 編輯部被遣散，黃濤被關進了“牛棚”。

sentences.english: Applicant who applies for second dan or above are required to apply the Korea ChungDoKwan Dan certificate concomitantly.
sentences.chinese: 晉升二段或以上者必需同時申請韓國青濤舘段證。

sentences.english: He will be in his small boat, Topsail.
sentences.chinese: 他將乘坐他的‘濤波賽’號小艇。

definition: surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
to gallop/to assist/to attack/to wade/great/old variant of 憑|凭[ping2]
dawn/daybreak/to know/to let sb know/to make explicit
Zheng state during the Warring States period/surname Zheng/abbr. for 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
